Name: Ether Crystal
Desc: When Ether Sword attacks enemies, it sometimes gathers the scattered Ether to create a crystal. Using Resonance allows you to charge towards the crystal.

H.Old:
Lasts for 30 sec. and up to 7 can exist in a map.
When a new crystal forms past the max amount, the next expiring crystal disappears.
Crystals can't be created on top of each other or near specific platforms that aren't reachable.
Cooldown: 4 sec.
